query:
SELECT 
  'Total geral' as categoria,
  COUNT(*) as quantidade,
  '' as detalhes
FROM videoaulas

UNION ALL

SELECT 
  'Com oferta válida' as categoria,
  COUNT(*) as quantidade,
  '' as detalhes
FROM videoaulas v
WHERE v.ofertaDisciplinaId IN (SELECT id FROM ofertasDisciplinas)

UNION ALL

SELECT 
  'Órfãs (sem oferta)' as categoria,
  COUNT(*) as quantidade,
  '' as detalhes
FROM videoaulas v
WHERE v.ofertaDisciplinaId NOT IN (SELECT id FROM ofertasDisciplinas);
